name: Alchemical Catalyst
description:
Produces 8, plus additional based on Alchemy skill. 

May also yield Sorcerous Fire and/or Sorcerous Water.

Cooldown resets daily.

name: Alchemical Catalyst - Fireweed
description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

name: Alchemical Catalyst - Flytrap
description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

name: Alchemical Catalyst - Starflower
description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

name: Alchemical Catalyst - Orchid
description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

name: Alchemical Catalyst - Lotus
description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

name: Alchemical Catalyst
description:
Produces 10. May also yield Sorcerous Fire and/or Sorcerous Water.

Can be performed up to three times in a row, but it takes 24 hours to recover 1 use.

name: Secrets of Draenor Alchemy
description: Cooldown resets daily.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Transmute: Primordial Ruby
description:
When performing this transmute, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Riddle of Steel
description:
When performing this transmute, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

Using Spirits of Harmony to create Living Steel does not tax the alchemist, allowing them to ignore the normal one day of rest.

name: Desecrated Oil
description:
When making this oil, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Flask of Winter's Bite
description:
When making this flask, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Flask of Falling Leaves
description:
When making this flask, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Flask of the Warm Sun
description:
When making this flask, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Flask of the Earth
description:
When making this flask, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Flask of Spring Blossoms
description:
When making this flask, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

name: Zen Alchemist Stone
description:
When making this potion, you have a chance to learn other Pandaria alchemy recipes.

Discovered recipes can also reveal additional recipes when created.

name: Transmute: Amberjewel
description: Transmutes lesser yellow gems and the timeless essense of whiptail to create an amberjewel.

name: Transmute: Demonseye
description: Transmutes lesser purple gems and the magical essense of twilight jasmine to create a demonseye.

name: Transmute: Dream Emerald
description: Transmutes lesser green gems and the electrical currents of stormvine to create a dream emerald.

name: Transmute: Ember Topaz
description: Transmutes lesser orange gems and the fiery essense of cinderbloom to create an ember topaz.

name: Transmute: Inferno Ruby
description: Transmutes lesser red gems and the essence of the heartblossom to create an inferno ruby.

name: Transmute: Truegold
description: Transmutes pyrium bars into truegold.

name: Transmute: Living Elements
description: Transforms the essence of life into another element.  The exact result is not known ahead of time.

name: Transmute: Ocean Sapphire
description: Transmutes lesser blue gems and the oils from Azshara's Veil to create an ocean sapphire.

name: Transmute: Pyrium Bar
description: Transmutes elementium and volatile earth into a pyrium bar.

name: Transmute: Shadowspirit Diamond
description: Transmute several lesser gems into a beautiful shadowspirit diamond.

name: Transmute: Eternal Air to Earth
description: Transmutes Eternal Air to Earth.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Air to Water
description: Transmutes Eternal Air to Water.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Earth to Air
description: Transmutes Eternal Earth to Air.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Earth to Shadow
description: Transmutes Eternal Earth to Shadow.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Fire to Life
description: Transmutes Eternal Fire to Life.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Fire to Water
description: Transmutes Eternal Fire to Water.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Life to Fire
description: Transmutes Eternal Life to Fire.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Life to Shadow
description: Transmutes Eternal Life to Shadow.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Shadow to Earth
description: Transmutes Eternal Shadow to Earth.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Shadow to Life
description: Transmutes Eternal Shadow to Life.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Water to Air
description: Transmutes Eternal Water to Air.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Water to Fire
description: Transmutes Eternal Water to Fire.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eternal Might
description: Transmutes Eternal Life to Shadow.

name: Transmute: Skyflare Diamond
description: Transmute the element of air and gems into a Skyflare Diamond.

name: Transmute: Earthsiege Diamond
description: Transmute the element of fire and gems into a Earthsiege Diamond.

name: Transmute: Titanium
description: Transmutes many saronite bars into a single titanium bar.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

name: Transmute: Eye of Zul
description: Transmute several Forest Emeralds into an Eye of Zul.

name: Transmute: Ametrine
description: Transmute the element of shadow and a Monarch Topaz into an Ametrine.

name: Transmute: Cardinal Ruby
description: Transmute the element of fire and a Scarlet Ruby into a Cardinal Ruby.

name: Transmute: King's Amber
description: Transmute the element of life and a Autumn's Glow into King's Amber.

name: Transmute: Dreadstone
description: Transmute the element of shadow and a Twilight Opal into a Dreadstone.

name: Transmute: Majestic Zircon
description: Transmute the element of air and a Sky Sapphire into a Majestic Zircon.

name: Northrend Alchemy Research
description: Experiment with Northrend herbs to discover a new Alchemy recipe.  Can only be done every 3 days.

name: Transmute: Primal Air to Fire
description: Transmutes Primal Air into Primal Fire.

name: Transmute: Primal Earth to Water
description: Transmutes Primal Earth into Primal Water.

name: Transmute: Primal Fire to Earth
description: Transmutes Primal Fire into Primal Earth.

name: Transmute: Primal Water to Air
description: Transmutes Primal Water into Primal Air.

name: Transmute: Primal Earth to Life
description: Transmutes Primal Earth into Primal Life.

name: Transmute: Primal Fire to Mana
description: Transmutes Primal Fire into Primal Mana.

name: Transmute: Primal Life to Earth
description: Transmutes Primal Life into Primal Earth.

name: Transmute: Primal Mana to Fire
description: Transmutes Primal Mana into Primal Fire.

name: Transmute: Primal Shadow to Water
description: Transmutes Primal Shadow into Primal Water.

name: Transmute: Primal Water to Shadow
description: Transmutes Primal Water into Primal Shadow.

name: Transmute: Primal Might
description: Transmutes Primal Earth, Water, Air, Fire and Mana into Primal Might.

name: Transmute: Earthstorm Diamond
description: Transmutes gems and elemental forces into an Earthstorm Diamond.

name: Transmute: Skyfire Diamond
description: Transmutes gems and elemental forces into a Skyfire Diamond.

name: Transmute: Iron to Gold
description: Turns a bar of Iron into a bar of Gold.

name: Transmute: Mithril to Truesilver
description: Turns a bar of Mithril into a bar of Truesilver.

name: Transmute: Arcanite
description: Turns a bar of Thorium and an Arcane Crystal into Arcanite.

name: Transmute: Air to Fire
description: Transmutes Air into Fire.

name: Transmute: Earth to Water
description: Transmutes Earth into Water.

name: Transmute: Earth to Life
description: Transmutes Earth to Living Essence.

name: Transmute: Fire to Earth
description: Transmutes Fire into Earth.

name: Transmute: Undeath to Water
description: Purifies Essence of Undeath turning it into Water.

name: Transmute: Water to Air
description: Transmutes Water into Air.

name: Transmute: Water to Undeath
description: Taints Essence of Water turning it into Undeath.

name: Transmute: Life to Earth
description: Transmutes Living Essence into Earth.

name: Transmute: Elemental Fire
description: Transmutes a Heart of Fire into three Elemental Fires.

name: Anti-Venom
description: Creates 3 vials of Anti-Venom.

name: Strong Anti-Venom
description: Creates 3 vials of Strong Anti-Venom.

name: Powerful Anti-Venom
description: Creates a vial of Powerful Anti-Venom.
